attributes.action: Reduce speed limits to 30mph throughout the boundary of Dartmoor national park
attributes.additional_details:
To many livestock and wildlife are killed daily by cars traveling at excess speed in the national park. Removing all nation speed limits within the park and making the whole
Park a maximum 30mph would save the lives of many livestock and wildlife including some with dwindling numbers like hedgehog
attributes.background: Look at speed restrictions in rural areas like Dartmoor National park. The whole boundary of the nation park need to be a designated as a maximum 30mph zone. Including all road through grazing areas and villages

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
